CustomField.description: Created this field for Conga Renewal Agreement purposes & updated the data type to Number to avoid numbers displaying in Corporate Currency.
CustomField.formula: IF( (ISBLANK( Renewal_OLI_ID__c ) && ISBLANK( Upsell_OLI_ID__c ) && For_Renewal__c = TRUE) || (ISBLANK( Renewal_OLI_ID__c ) && NOT(ISBLANK( Upsell_OLI_ID__c )) && For_Renewal__c = TRUE), MAX( Total_Default_Price_ARR_One_off__c , Total_Sales_Price_ARR_One_off__c ), Total_Initial_Default_Price_ARR_One_off__c + Cumulative_Indexation_Amount__c )
CustomField.label: Subscription Fee
